title: shinamaDaiyaadhE
sahitya:
shinamaDaiyAdE shIri vizhAdE shiranda guNangaLai shidara viDAdE

(shinam)



anupallavi



manam pOna pOkkinil pOga viDAdE mAperum pugazhvarin magizhndu

tuLLAdE 

(shinam)



caraNam



arpparai pOi aDuttun arivai virkkAdE arivuDaip-periyOrai

avamadikkAdE

karpanai ulaginil kanavu kANAdE kAlam kaDanda pin kaN

vizhikkAdE 

(shinam)
